title: Special Episode: Europe’s Economic Scarring Post-Pandemic
description: Recessions can create long-term scars on labor, investment and the pace of innovation. Is Europe more prepared to lessen COVID-related economic scarring than in past crises?
itunes:title: Special Episode: Europe’s Economic Scarring Post-Pandemic
itunes:summary: Recessions can create long-term scars on labor, investment and the pace of innovation. Is Europe more prepared to lessen COVID-related economic scarring than in past crises?
